SubmissionModal.SolarEarnRole: Solar Earn acts solely as a platform for the Partner to list contests, bounties, projects or similar engagements ("Activities") on its platform ("ST Earn Platform").
SubmissionModal.SolarEarnLiability: Solar Earn shall not be liable for any Activities listed by the Partner on the ST Earn Platform. The Partner is solely responsible for the content, rules, scope and execution of their Activities.
SubmissionModal.userParticipationRisk: Users participating in Activities listed by Partners do so at their own risk and discretion. Solar Earn disclaims all liabilities related to user participation in such Activities.
SubmissionModal.disputeResolution: Any disputes or issues arising between users and partners regarding Activities shall be resolved directly between the parties involved. Solar Earn shall not be responsible for mediating or resolving such disputes.
SubmissionModal.releaseOfLiability: By using the platform and participating in any Activities, users agree to release Solar Earn from any claims, liabilities, or damages arising from their participation in Activities listed by Partners.
SubmissionModal.noGuarantee: Solar Earn does not guarantee the accuracy or legality of Activities listed by Partners. Users are advised to exercise caution and conduct their own due diligence before participating in any Activities.
SubmissionModal.partnerIndemnification: Partners listing Activities on the Platform agree to indemnify and hold Solar Earn harmless from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from their Activities.
SubmissionModal.additionalTerms: These terms are in addition to our

footer.description: Discover high paying crypto bounties, projects and grants from the best Solana companies in one place and apply to them using a single profile.
footer.whereTeamsCome: Where Solana teams come to get sh*t done

search.enterKeyword: Enter a keyword to find what you need.

Results.noResultsFound: We couldn't find anything for that keyword
Results.pleaseEnterKeyword: Please enter a keyword to search

stepTwo.writeDeepDive: Write a Deep Dive on PiperCoin
stepTwo.piedPiperDescription: Pied Piper is a pioneering middle-out compression company. The company is looking for bounty hunters to deep dive into the $PIPER coin, and explain the coin's background and utility to noobs.

whoQualifies.question: Who qualifies to be a sponsor?
whoQualifies.answer: Any team or project that is building in the Solana ecosystem can sponsor a listing on Solar Earn. Size of the team or operations don't matter ‚Äî you can be a tokenised project or a small grantee; as long as you are building on the Solana blockchain, you can add a listing on Earn.

moneyNeeded.question: How much money do I need to put up?
moneyNeeded.answer: There is no upper or lower limit of the amount of money you need to put up per listing. However, the compensation offered per listing will affect the distribution (via emails, discord, platform discovery, etc.) that the listing will get.

whoJudges.question: Who judges the bounties & projects?
whoJudges.answer: The sponsors are supposed to review, announce, and pay out the winners on Solar Earn. It's super simple to manage your submissions, all within Earn.

hiddenCosts.question: Are there any hidden costs and charges?

whatCanUse.question: What can I use Solar Earn for?
whatCanUse.answer:
Solar Earn is a platform to get work done from crypto-native talent. This can be in the form of boutnies (get the same work done by many people) or hiring freelancers in the form of Project listings.
Earn can be used to get any small to medium scale task done, including but not limited to development, writing, design, research, and product feedback.
Click here to access the Listings Menu, which contains ideas, listing examples, suggested prize ranges, etc.

needHelp.question: I need help with my listing. How can I get in touch?
needHelp.answer: You can get in touch with us at support@Solarearn.com and we will get back to you ASAP.

Features.manageListingsDescription: A seamless way to manage all your listings in one place
Features.publishListingDescription: Never start from scratch. No hassle of writing your own descriptions: either duplicate an existing bounty, or choose from 10+ templates.
Features.reviewAndSortDescription: Reviewing submissions is no longer a pain. Effortlessly categorize submissions with our intuitive labelling system.
Features.easyPaymentsDescription: Pay talent directly from the platform without worrying about sending payment to the wrong address.
Features.skillBasedTargetingDescription: Each new listing gets sent to relevant people via e-mail and Discord.
Features.getQuotesDescription: Not sure how to budget your freelance gig? Opt to receive quotes from participants instead.
Features.inviteAndCollaborateDescription: Invite multiple team members via email, and collaborate on managing your listings.

hero.title: Where Solana teams come to get sh*t done
hero.description: The world's best Solana talent is on Solar Earn. Get work done from the right people, at the right time.

listingTypes.startPosting: Start by posting your first Bounty or Project
listingTypes.bountyDescription: Bounties are listings where everyone completes a given scope of work, and competes for the prize pool
listingTypes.projectDescription: Projects are freelance gigs ‚Äî people apply with their proposals but don't begin working until you pick them

bountyFeatures.awareness: Great for awareness campaigns where you want to reach the most people possible
bountyFeatures.multipleOptions: Get multiple options to choose from
bountyFeatures.examples: Examples: Twitter Threads, Deep-Dives, Memes, Product Feedback, and more

projectFeatures.collaboration: Perfect for work that requires collaboration and iteration
projectFeatures.singleOutput: Single output that is specific to your exact needs
projectFeatures.examples: Examples: Full Stack Development, Hype Video Production, Hiring a Community Manager, and more
